article:
The Sustainable Product Engineering Centre for Innovative Functional Industrial
Coatings (SPECIFIC) is an academic and industrial consortium led by Swansea
University with Tata Steel as the main industrial partner. It is funded by
EPSRC, Technology Strategy Board and the Welsh Government.

http://www.walesonline.co.uk/business-in-wales/business-news/2012/10/24/pilot-
production-line-for-products-allowing-buildings-to-generate-power-goes-live-
91466-32094285/

'Not to be confused with PV Accelerator at Shotton, North Wales'
